description: Try our easy to follow Beef Chilli Con Carne recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chilli,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Mince,Tomato,Avocado,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Beef Chilli Con Carne Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g can borlotti beans, rinsed and drained
1 chorizo sausage, quartered lengthways and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large casserole pan, add onion, garlic and chorizo. Cook, stirring over medium heat until onion is soft. Add beef, cook, stirring over high heat; breaking up with back of a spoon until dry and browned. Stir in tomato paste, spices, canned tomatoes, beans, vinegar, honey and 1 cup of water.
Simmer partially covered for 20-30 minutes or until sauce has thickened slightly. Remove from heat. Stir in cherry tomatoes and baby spinach. Season to taste.

Serve chilli con carne with diced avocado and corn chips. Tip 1: You can freeze the chilli con carne for up to 3 months, thawed overnight in the fridge. Tip 2: Swap corn chips for soft tortillas. Tip 3: For a vegetarian/vegan chilli swap the chorizo and beef with 2 cups grated carrot, add 1 teaspoon paprika and 1 can cannellini beans extra with remaining ingredients, omitting the sour cream.
